channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Ski Goggles, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2026)
item.description: From bluebird days to blizzards, WIRED tested the best ski goggles for all weather conditions.

item.title: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
item.description: Designed to autonomously resolve help desk tickets, Risotto has raised $10 million in seed funding in a round led by Bonfire Ventures.

item.title: Pinterest to lay off 15% of staff to redirect resources to AI
item.description: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products ...

item.title: Samsung’s TriFold phone will cost $2,899 in the US
item.description: The phone's display unfolds twice to reveal a 10-inch display, which is the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone.

item.title: This Humanoid Is Ready to Bring You a Toothbrush
item.description: Fauna, a new startup, is betting that humanoid robots will find success as hospitality workers, research assistants, and entertainers.

item.title: 8 Best Laptops (2026), WIRED-Tested and Approved
item.description: Our expert team of laptop testers stand behind these Windows laptops, MacBooks, Chromebooks, and Linux portables.

item.title: He Leaked the Secrets of a Southeast Asian Scam Compound. Then He Had to Get Out Alive
item.description: A source trapped inside an industrial-scale scamming operation contacted me, determined to expose his captors’ crimes—and then escape. This is his sto...

item.title: The Smart Light Bulbs Worth Buying in 2026: Cync, Meross, Tapo
item.description: If you’re new to smart home tech, light bulbs are an affordable, low-commitment place to start.

item.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
item.description: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch.

item.title: Airtable gets into the AI agent game with Superagent
item.description: SuperAgent is Airtable's first standalone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI m...
